title: Generate Monthly Home Energy Report
description: An agent needs to automatically generate a personalized monthly energy report for a residential customer with rooftop solar.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's electricity consumption, solar generation, and grid import/export data for the past month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary interval data.

tasks.description: Compare their consumption to the previous month and the same month last year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the percentage change in energy use.

tasks.description: Provide a personalized tip for energy savings based on their usage patterns (e.g., 'You used 20% more energy during peak hours. Consider shifting laundry to off-peak times.').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a relevant, data-driven savings tip.

tasks.description: Compile the information into a visually appealing report and email it to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates and sends the report.
